heading: Prevalence of amphetamine use in Europe
subheading: Prevalence of amphetamine use of young adults (15-34) in Europe in countries of the European Union in 2022
textNote: Surveys, which group amphetamine and methamphetamine together, conducted by 25 EU countries between 2016 and 2022 suggest that 1.3 million young adults (15 to 34) used amphetamines during the last year (1.3 % of this age group).
